newsitem.title: USA: Police arrest man in California triple murder.
newsitem.headline: Police arrest man in California triple murder.

text.p: Police on Tuesday arrested a man for allegedly killing his mother, a former girlfriend and her 11-month-old child in a bloody rampage in his California home.
Police said Issa Abujabar, 23, used a handgun in the San Francisco attacks late on Monday. He was taken into custody early on Tuesday and was charged with three counts of murder.
Police Lt. David Robinson said officers found blood throughout the house, where authorities believe Abujabar lived with his mother.
"They found blood on the floors in every room and on some of the walls," Robinson said, adding that it was the worst crime scene he had ever seen.
Robinson said police have not determined the motive behind the attack. The suspect refused to talk to police. Reports said the shooting may have been part of a satanic ritual.
"Abujabar stated to a witness that he was Lucifer," Robinson said. "But we found no satanic items or indications of any satanic rituals."
The names of the three victims were not released.
